{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|し|しょう}}

===Etymology===
{{IPAchar|/ɕiɕjau/}} → {{IPAchar|/ɕiɕjɔː/}} → {{IPAchar|/ɕiɕjoː/}}

May be a coinage in Japan, as a compound of {{etyl|ltc|-}}-derived elements {{compound|lang=ja|sort=ししょう|市|tr1=shi|t1=city|章|tr2=shō|t2=seal, mark, logo}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|ししょう|acc=0|acc_ref=SMK5}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ししょう|hhira=ししやう}}

# the [[seal]], [[crest]], or [[logo]] of a [[city]]

====Usage notes====
Sometimes erroneously translated as {{m|en|city}} {{m|en|chapter}}, due to the additional meaning of {{m|en|chapter|pos=of a book or other written document}} for the {{m|ja|章}} kanji.

* {{ja-r|町章|ちょうしょう}}: the [[seal]], [[crest]], or [[logo]] of a [[town]]
* {{ja-r|村章|そんしょう}}: the [[seal]], [[crest]], or [[logo]] of a [[village]]
* {{ja-r|市町村章|しちょうそんしょう}}: the [[seal]], [[crest]], or [[logo]] of a [[municipality]] {{qualifier|without specifying size}}
